modName: Digitigrade Beast Races Full DLC Edition
summary: Adds digitigrade feet and footwear to Khajiit and Argonians, with full support for the Dawnguard and Dragonborn DLCs.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3][center][img]http://i.imgur.com/087JAFU.png[/img][/center]


[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/BgHQuf1.png[/img][/center]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/582915]artifex0[/url]: Big thanks to artifex0 for allowing me to build on his [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/43833]Digitigrade Khajiit[/url] and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19283]Argonian Raptor Feet[/url] mods.

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50637]True Digitigrade Beast Races[/url]: A skeleton replacer for beast races. I highly recommend using the linked mod to further enhance the effect of this mod.

Fonts: I use the 'Planewalker' font for the headings on this page, from [url=http://www.myrrlyn.com/fonts.html][Here][/url].


[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/24N0Miw.png[/img][/center]
This mod replaces the feet and footwear models of Khajiit and Argonians to be shaped less like humans badly in need of a pedicure, and more like animal feet the way they were depicted in The Elder Scrolls III: Morrowind (except you can still equip footwear).

Compatible with all footwear from Skyrim, + the Dawnguard and Dragonborn DLCs (please let me know if I missed anything).


[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/zoQd6by.png[/img][/center]
This mod requires Skyrim v1.9 + the Dawnguard & Dragonborn DLCs.


[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/tEcDh4T.png[/img][/center]
v1.1: Fixed Nightingale boots for Argonians, added compatibility files for Morrowind Armor - Netch Leather.

v1.0: Initial upload.


[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/XUk7fk0.png[/img][/center]
Most footwear is not compatible with texture replacements.

Some minor clipping issues may be noticable.


[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/Mn7Tk9d.png[/img][/center]
Digitigrade Beast Races Full DLC Edition: on [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=228314296]Steam Workshop[/url].

Morrowind Amor - Netch Leather: on [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=223298980]Steam Workshop[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50339]Skyrim Nexus[/url] and the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51039]French translation[/url] on Skyrim Nexus.

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/22793]Morrowind Armor Compilation[/url]: My original armor mod which added several types of armor unique to Morrowind into Skyrim, created well before the Dragonborn DLC was announced.

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32226]Teh-Husky Mod Compilation[/url]: A compilation of my most popular older mods, mostly armor mods.[/size]
author: Teh-Husky
